title: Storage Room Sizes & Pricing
desc: Choose the storage size that fits your needs. All rooms are secure and clean, with optional air conditioning for better preservation.

custom3d.title: Customize your storage room
custom3d.desc: Add shelves and boxes into your room to organize it your way.

packageSelect.title: Package matching your selected room
packageSelect.basicDesc: Small room - Basic package: 1 shelf + 10 boxes A
packageSelect.businessDesc: Medium room - Business package: 2 shelves + 20 boxes + 10km delivery
packageSelect.premiumDesc: Large room - Premium package: 5 shelves + 30 boxes + 2 oversize items

customChoice.title: Choose your room type
customChoice.desc: Would you like to use a pre-set package or customize your own storage layout?
